moduleMetadataJson.name: OSX Network Share Mounter
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module lists saved network shares and tries to connect to them using stored
          credentials. This does not require root privileges.
author: Peter Toth <globetother@gmail.com>
joev <joev@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: VOLUME
options.description: Name of network share volume. `set ACTION LIST` to get a list.

options.name: PROTOCOL
options.description: Network share protocol. (Accepted: smb, nfs, cifs, ftp, afp)

options.name: SIDEBAR_PLIST_PATH
options.description: Path to the finder sidebar plist.

options.name: RECENT_PLIST_PATH
options.description: Path to the finder recent plist.
